name: HADJ SASSI Mahdi
description: I am a highly motivated and versatile engineering student currently pursuing a dual degree program between the École Nationale Supérieure d'Ingénieurs de Tunis (ENSIT) and the École Nationale Supérieure de l'Électronique et de ses Applications (ENSEA) in France. With a strong foundation in software development, artificial intelligence, and embedded systems, I have consistently excelled in both academic and extracurricular pursuits.
